title: The Bard
description: The carefree Bard symbolizes the beginning of a new adventure. Perhaps you are learning something new, meeting new people, or looking at a challenge with a newfound perspective.

title: The Bard
description: Now is the time to start something new, even if you are unsure of the outcome. Trust in your performance, but also take time to make sure that you are well prepared.

title: The Ranger
description: The independent Ranger shines a light into the darkness. Although you walk alone, you are not afraid. You have a trusted companion who supports you on your journey, whether you know it or not.

title: The Ranger
description: Solitude has become desolation. Take the time and effort to reconnect with someone who has been a positive part of your journey.

title: The Monk
description: The duality of the Monk brings forces into balance. If you meditate on the inner truth, you can bring your mind and body into focus. Whatever challenge you face is intuitively achievable.

title: The Monk
description: When your world is out of balance, withdraw into your inner sanctum in order to clear your mind and quiet the storm. You will be ready to face the tempest with renewed calm energy.

title: The Fighter
description: The Fighter is a natural leader and protector. You are unafraid of conflict, and your life experience grows because of it. You seek fairness and peace, although there is often turmoil in your path.

title: The Fighter
description: Beware an ascent into tyranny. Are you restricting the freedoms of another for your own benefit? Or perhaps there is a different figure of authority in your life that you must fight to dethrone.

title: The Cleric
description: The pious Cleric has plenty of knowledge to absorb and divulge. Seeking unity and a common goal, you are a pillar of support for your group or community. What else can you do to help those around you?

title: The Cleric
description: Be careful not to fall into an echo chamber of reverberating thoughts and dogma. Challenge what you have been taught, for it is the only way to gain new insight and find your own voice.

title: The Rogue
description: Born from turmoil, the Rogue adapts quickly to any challenge. Although you appear aloof, you carry a painful past that you would rather avoid than confront, and you employ a whole host of subversive skills to do so.

title: The Rogue
description: Break the shackles that bind you by facing the challenge you have been evading. Once you do, you will feel lighter and more powerful than before.

title: The Barbarian
description: The Barbarian’s unparalleled stamina and power are great forces; with them, you are fearless and confident. Protect others,and they will repay you withfriendship and loyalty.

title: The Barbarian
description: Your animal instincts and rage may be detrimental to you and your goals. Be careful not to push yourself too hard; you may end up exhausting your energy and in deeper water than you thought.

title: The Druid
description: The Druid seeks harmony and justice. However, not everything is clearly good or evil. Delve into the murky waters of your situation to uncover the truths. Don’t be afraid to ask for guidance from others.

title: The Druid
description: It is easier to remain neutralinstead of taking a stance for one side or another. But inaction can lead to imbalance. Seek out your voice and stand with those who need your assistance.

title: The Wizard
description: The ingenious Wizard uses the tools at their disposal to create magic. Be resourceful and your magic will be greater than the sum of its parts. Concentrate on your goals and you will succeed.

title: The Wizard
description: Presented with too manyoptions or paths, you may find yourself paralyzed with uncertainty. Concentrate on your main goal and don’t be afraid to step outsideof your comfort zone totake a risk.

title: The Paladin
description: The righteous Paladin is often guided by a higher power, but also trusts in her own wisdom and judgement. Seek guidance from others, but do what you think is right for yourself.

title: The Paladin
description: At times you may be lost in the darkness of your own self-doubts, regrets, or guilt. The harshest judgement comes from within, so you must learn to forgive yourself, just as you would forgive others for their mistakes.

title: The Warlock
description: The domineering Warlock is bound to a patron from whom they draw their power. Bind yourself to a mentor or a loved one who empowers you. Streng then your bond through mutual trust and communication.

title: The Warlock
description: A successful Warlock must balance their relationships well; imbalance will break bonds. If the bond is no longer beneficial for both parties, it is time to part ways and seek a new path forward.

title: The Sorcerer
description: Magic comes naturally to the gifted Sorcerer. Leverage your innate talent and creative energy in your endeavors. Put your plans into action and watch the flame of your soul burn bright.

title: The Sorcerer
description: If you lack a clear plan or goal, your untrained power may manifest haphazardly, causing destruction around you. Focus on your original vision and center yourself so that your magic will find its mark.

title: The Adversary
description: Facing the Adversary will give you new experiences and insight. Engage obstacles you face without fear, especially if you have your allies there to support you.

title: The Adversary
description: You face the end of something important in your life. It may be a difficult and harrowing ordeal, but it will not last forever or be without purpose. Learn from the experience of pain and loss so that you may ascend to greater heights.

title: The Mystic
description: The Mystic turns her mind’s eye toward others in order to find the answers she seeks. Trust your insight and the instincts of others to achieve your goals.

title: The Mystic
description: Feeling too intuitive and right can cause you to become cynical, if you believe you can predict others’ thoughts and behaviors. Don’t jump to conclusions based purely on instinct. If you give others room to prove themselves, they can surprise you.

title: The Blood Hunter
description: The misunderstood Blood Hunter sacrifices everything in order to pursue her own form of justice. Is your goal worth the pain and suffering you create for yourself?

title: The Blood Hunter
description: If you have sacrificed any of your values to achieve your goals, seek atonement for your transgressions. Repair any of the boundaries that you have broken, especially if you have broken your own.

title: The Artificer
description: The Artificer uses her innate ingenuity to create magic from mundane things in order to help others. Can you see a new use for something in your life that you may have overlooked before?

title: The Artificer
description: Progress should not come at the expense of morality. Be careful you do not use your intellect to harm others. You may feel powerful with your arsenal of weapons, but at the cost of peace with those around you.

title: The Ally
description: Companionship can make even a difficult journey enjoyable. Find someone who is on the same quest as you, and use your alliance to your advantage.

title: The Ally
description: On your journey you may find yourself saddled with an inept companion who proves to be more of a burden than a helping hand. Your could jettison them and continue alone, or work to find a hidden strength you both may have overlooked.

title: The Companion
description: You have a stalwart Companion who fights alongside you on your journey. Recognize who they are, and let them know that you appreciate their support.

title: The Companion
description: Without proper nurturing and care, even the most special bonds can be broken. Do not take your relationship with your loyal Companion for granted, lest they retreat back to the wilderness to better care for themselves

title: The Familiar
description: There is someone important in your life who is with you every step of the way. It could be a person, a pet, or even yourself. Appreciating this individual is essential in your journey

title: The Familiar
description: Your magical Familiar is your trusted assistant, and it also takes the shape of what you see yourself as or who you secretly want to be. How can you use your alter ego to achieve your goals?

title: The Beast
description: The pack is strongest when it is united. Whatever your fight is, seek harmony with yourself or others and use teamwork in order to prevail against all odds.

title: The Beast
description: A lone wolf may be stronger and more intelligent, but without the help of a pack she will never be able to take down a serious adversary. You can retain your independence, but remember that you can turn to others for help, especially if the alliance is beneficial for all.

title: The Dragon
description: The Dragon symbolizes fertility and abundance. Take stock of the bounty that surrounds you and be grateful for what you have, for genuine appreciation will bring more good things into your life.

title: The Dragon
description: The Dragon compulsively hoards treasures, although she has no real use for her collection. If you are unwilling to share what you have, be it love, attention, or wealth, it will ultimately lead to unhappiness or even devastating loss.

title: The Undead
description: Death is inevitable. Embrace the change you are afraid of, and take the chance to start anew. You never know what new opportunities and adventures await you.

title: The Undead
description: Start over by releasing the control that your past has over you. You may be hesitant to let go of your past traumas because you believe they define you, but you are not your trauma and you are not your ego. Find out who you truly are in this present moment.

title: The Ooze
description: Like water, the Ooze changes shape to fit any situation. Embrace your intuition and empathy, and let your emotions guide you. Don’t be afraid to feel and express your feelings, because they are valid.

title: The Ooze
description: If you are too empathetic and accommodating, you may feel overwhelmed. Remember that you should not take on everyone else’s problems, and that you need to care for yourself first and foremost.

title: The Aberration
description: Something stands in the way of your evolution. Be mindful of what is holding you back; are you clinging to old beliefs that no longer ring true? Are you waiting on someone else to change or make a decision?

title: The Aberration
description: You might resist metamorphosis, but change is inevitable. Embrace your transformation and use this newfound perspective to your advantage in your endeavors. friendship with those around you.

title: The Plant
description: The Plant epitomizes slow and steady growth. Hard work and responsibility yield a beautiful bounty if you put in the time and commitment. Trust in yourself that you are on the right path.

title: The Plant
description: If you are feeling entangled in your routine or too crowded to grow properly, feel free to break away and embrace spontaneity. Send your shoots out in search of new sources of light and fertile soils.

title: The Elemental
description: The four Elements come together to celebrate the completion of a major goal in your life. Reflect positively upon what you have achieved, and be open to whatever exciting adventure comes next.

title: The Elemental
description: You are struggling to let go of the past and move on. Channel the power of the Elements for help: Fire: Courage, Passion, Exercise. Water: Empathy, Peace, Self-Care. Air: Connection, Imagination, Meditation. Earth: Strength, Logic, Sustenance.

title: The Construct
description: Use your inner power and courage to assert yourself. Define your boundaries, needs, and goals in order to achieve what you deserve. Have faith in yourself and all that you stand for.

title: The Construct
description: If you are gripping the controls too tightly, your rigidity will cost you your freedom. Learn to let go, and let the automaton run its course. Appreciate your journey and the company of your fellow travelers.

title: The Fey
description: The seasons change, and so will you. You are embarking on a journey of personal growth, so shed any negative beliefs or fears that hold you back; allow yourself the freedom to chase your dreams.

title: The Fey
description: The Fey gazes at her starry reflection in the pond. Take the time to reconnect yourself and your goals. If you feel stagnant, renew your energy with a purification ritual; take a bath, go skinny dipping, or swim in a lake.

title: The Celestial
description: The Celestial represents success and power, which radiate from you and draw others to your warm presence. Be steadfast in who you are and what you stand for, and your allies will rally behind you.

title: The Celestial
description: You feel guilt, shame, or like a failure due to rigid rules or values others have created for you. Spread your wings and break free from the shadowy clutches of your former captors; you don’t have to be the person they told you to be.

title: The Humanoid
description: The Humanoid seeks knowledge, and the truth, cutting through any nonsense to get to the heart of the matter. An unbiased and logical approach garners respect. Others may come to you for advice.

title: The Humanoid
description: Realize that anything you experience is only seen through the lens of your own past. It is not possible to truly see things from another’s perspective. Just have compassion and hold space for others without passing judgement.

title: The Fiend
description: If you think you have lost control to addictions or negative thoughts, acknowledge your dire situation and shine your light on the Fiend. She will loosen her grip on you. It takes willpower and time to regain your freedom, but it is possible.

title: The Fiend
description: The delicious fruit of instant gratification is extremely appealing, but at times it is prudent to keep your priorities in check and refuse temptations that might cause you to stray from your path.

title: The Giant
description: Resilience is one of your greatest strengths. However, that is not to say that you are not sensitive as well. Don’t neglect your own wellbeing while you attempt to uphold your goals or values. Remember that you, too, can fall.

title: The Giant
description: It’s good to take your time and mull over decisions if you have that luxury, but be careful not to take too long to make up your mind, lest smaller and faster creatures take advantage of your sluggishness.

title: The Monstrosity
description: The Monstrosity signifies upheaval and chaos, an event that threatens to destroy your life as you know it, unless you view her through a different lens and accept the change as an experience to overcome and grow from.

title: The Monstrosity
description: You are currently undergoing a personal transformation; however something is holding you back, old beliefs, fears, or opinions. Shed whatever is not working for you so that you can grow and evolve.

title: The Wild Oracle
description: Acknowledge that your destiny is in the hands of the Universe, and as much as you may try to control your life, there is no way to change it. Learn to be flexible and accept what Fate has to offer you.

title: The Wild Oracle
description: Belief in good luck provides optimism and a better outlook on life. Believing you are unlucky leads to anxiety and hesitance to take advantage of opportunity. Why believe you have bad luck?

title: The Designer
description: Give genuine compliments generously; they boost your own self-confidence and reinforce the self-esteem of your peers. Accept compliments gracefully and charm others with your positivity.

title: The Designer
description: We criticize others harshly for the things we most loathe about ourselves. If you find yourself becoming aggravated by someone else’s mistakes or actions, stop and consider if you are projecting your own shortcomings on your victim.

title: The Developer
description: All the facts are right in front of you, waiting for an ocular inspection from your eyestalks. Use the problem to build a castle in your mind and use its halls to find the best path to solve the problem.

title: The Developer
description: It’s easy to lose track of the outside world when you’re enjoying personal time in your private lair. Don’t forget to venture outside once in a while and reconnect with the rest of your party!

title: The Dungeon Mistress
description: The Dungeon Mistress is the Creator of infinite worlds. Tap into your creative powers and create the ideal outcome to your story.

title: The Dungeon Mistress
description: When you are in control of your dominion, be careful not to be too harsh to those who inhabit it. Use compassion and understanding in your judgement, for all humanoids are prone to making mistakes.
